vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.27;
son of: Joktan (H3355);
brother of: Almodad (H0486), Sheleph (H8026), Hazarmaveth (H2700), Jerah (H3392), Hadoram (H1913A), Diklah (H1853), Obal (H5745), Abimael (H0039), Sheba (H7614H), Ophir (H0211), Havilah (H2341I) and Jobab (H3103)
§ Uzal = "I shall be flooded"
sixth son Joktan
vocabinfos._es_Definition: hijo de Joctán; descendiente de Sem
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
烏薩 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "我將要被淹沒"
約坍的第六個兒子
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
乌萨 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "我将要被淹没"
约坍的第六个儿子

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Uzal = "I shall be flooded"
sixth son Joktan
